features.name: App
features.description: Main dashboard component that fetches and displays bookmarked YouTube videos and their notes. Handles theme, search, and layout.

features.name: Navbar
features.description: Fixed top navigation bar with logo, nav links, search, and theme toggle. Responsive and styled with neon effects.

features.name: Custom Animations & Styles
features.description: Neon glow, fade-in, slide-up, and bounce-on-hover animations for cards and notes.

features.name: Theme Configuration
features.description: Tailwind and DaisyUI configuration for custom dark theme with neon teal accent.
